Trails.Name: Lower Wanderer, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Old Log Rd, West Meadows, Mike's Way
Sun Bowl, Home Run, 91, Main Base Area

_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
2/19 2:30PM- Afternoon, yall! We are officially back to 100% open after Betwixt launched with 19 features, with more on the way. Lets do it all again tomorrow by taking turns on 99 open trails, with 65 of those trails taking on fresh stripes overnight. Alongside, 12 lifts are set to spin at 8:30 AM with no delays anticipated. Plus, early access will be available for First Tracks pass holders at 7:45AM. Keep on snow dancing, flip your PJs inside out, and put that spoon in the freezer, because Friday through Saturday, we are expecting 6-10 inches of snow! Have a great night,  Ill catch up with yall bright and early tomorrow morning.

The Gondola will remain closed on Friday, February 20, due to a mechanical issue. Our Lift Maintenance team is awaiting a replacement part required for repair. As this lift is one of a kind in North America, sourcing the necessary component requires additional coordination. This is not a standard stock item and must be specially sourced. We appreciate your patience as we work around the clock to secure the part and restore operations safely and as quickly as possible. 

Betwixt is now open with 19 features ready to ride and more on the way!  This past week, snowmakers laid down a solid foundation while the Parks Crew works day in and day out shaping, prepping, and dialing in features. Go check it out!

Safety Tip: Be aware that you may encounter snowmobiles or heavy machinery on the mountain. 

Presidents Week is here at Stratton, with a full week of skiing, events, and aprs across the mountain. Starting Saturday, February 14, through Sunday, February 22, lifts spin daily at 8:30AM along with live music, snowshoe hikes, snowcat dinners, and activities happening throughout the week. Off the slopes, enjoy tubing, cross-country skiing, ice skating, and more, while the Village comes alive with dining, shopping, and entertainment. Its one of the most exciting weeks of the season, and a perfect time to be at Stratton. Hope to see you here!

With conditions lining up this well, its a good time to take advantage of a few extra perks. Were offering lift tickets up to 50% off every Wednesday and Thursday this seasonexcluding Presidents Week.

Reliable cars are the name of the game; that is why we trust Oliver Subaru and Ford. Made for all seasons and all families, check out Oliver Ford and Oliver Subaru for year-round reliability!

Stay and relish the Green Mountains! Stratton Real Estate is here to help with all your real estate needs. Make your sweet escape a reality.
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: 8AM: This morning, during our pre-operational checks, our mechanics discovered an issue with the gondola and determined that we would be closing the lift for the day. They are determining the timeline for the fix and we will share more information as we receive it.
